subject: Delegation of Powers relating to various issues under Commercial Operation.
text: HRdy 7riv TTHNf xifetarrut 744 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 VI (Tsq Wde7 a TrThrf AAT4) Waq, Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 W 6, Wzr-10, aRdT, T fcrff-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Modification in Delegation of Powers/2018 Policy No.17.6.9, Dated the 13th March 2018 (Decision taken by EC in the meeting dated 05.03.2018 on the Agenda no.337.2) Sub: Delegation of Powers   relating to various issues under Commercial Operation: In partial modification of Policy Circular dated 13.12.2012 [Administration/ Finance No. 101/2012], it has been decided that all proposals of validation (initial fixation)/revision of user  fee rates for Public Funded/BOT/OMT /I 'BOT(Annuity) /Hybrid Annuity/ToT Projects shall be approved by Regional Officer of concerned project: 2 Henceforth, all Regional   Officers are requested to approve the   proposals of validation (initial fixation) / revision of user fee rates at their own end and not submit the proposal to NHAI, HQ 3|o3 (V.K. Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord;) To All Officers at NHAI HQROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices. Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi M1 7 7 NHAI
